@paultag Glad we settled this offline. I'm with you, even though my tweets might not have always made this clear. And I have erred too. ♥
@paultag back then, he was merely a lunatic that noone thought would get elected, nor did anyone imagine he'd be able to pull this shit off.
@paultag It's certainly not a level, nature, or spirit of conversation I am going to sustain. Sorry.
@paultag Also, trying to pin me on an alleged stance that was allegedly purported in series of 140 character tweets is just silly.
@paultag Dude… I don't understand your point. Do you really think I wanted Trump? For the record: I most certainly did not.
@paultag Please don't put words in my mouth. https://t.co/2Jy3IWnr2G
@paultag I believe I simply said that I could see benefits in not electing HRC. I never said the US should elect Dump.
@donttrythis he was only elected because he gamed the system and the system let itself be gamed.
